subject: Re: LPR Damaged
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Detective,

Apologies, thought I sent this email earlier but got distracted by some calls.

My schedule is pretty open tomorrow to discuss these locations and then any others we might want to move to existing poles. Times I am NOT available tomorrow would be 8am-10am PST, 12:00-12:30pm PST, and 2:00pm-2:30pm PST.

Regards
	
 
Matt Triana
Project Manager



 	 
 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/N8dQjWVQ3Zda.png> 


On Wed, Jun 4, 2025 at 8:46?AM Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com > wrote:


	Detective,

	Can you let me know which cameras numbers on your Deployment Plan https://planner.flocksafety.com/planning-portal/deployment-tracker/public/0f92e14e805f30bf6acf29115ee1c5820aec1eb8c7bfaa5b7b6f6f90d9bf70bbde0b70fa8d286980aff134e78f4cc8f6e90aca55f8078e31361e4d7703522a09  have been knocked over? There should already be a maintenance case open for the first camera that was hit, but if you could confirm which cameras have been hit that would be helpful for Gaby and myself.

	Regards
	
 
Matt Triana
Project Manager



 	 
	 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/N8dQjWVQ3Zda.png> 


	On Wed, Jun 4, 2025 at 8:38?AM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:
	

		Good morning,

		 

		We just had a second LPR camera, pole, solar panel destroyed.  They are separating it at the midway of the pole and then when it falls, smashing them.  Can we get on a call today, we need to discuss not putting another pole in the ground and moving these to traffic lights for any other deployments.

		
		Derek

		 

		Detective D. DeWitt

		Financial Crimes Unit

		Special Weapons and Tactics Team

		Background Investigations Team

		Eugene Police Department

		300 County Club Road

		Eugene, OR 97401

		Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

		Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

		Work Cell � 541-743-6192
